name: Ursarctic Miktanus
desc: During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can Tribute 1 other Level 7 or higher monster from your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except monsters with a Level. If this card is Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Ursarctic" monster in your GY, except "Ursarctic Miktanus"; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Ursarctic Miktanus" once per turn.
